data.title: Dominique Wilkins' relationship history: Who has the NBA legend dated?
data.meta_description: PROFESSIONAL basketball player Dominique Wilkins may be one of the best slam dunkers in NBA history, but his relationships off the court haven't alway
data.text:
PROFESSIONAL basketball player Dominique Wilkins may be one of the best slam dunkers in NBA history, but his relationships off the court haven't always scored.

It's still a mystery whether the nine-time NBA All-Star will include his three ex-wives, or his rumored new girlfriend, in his upcoming sports documentary.

Who is NBA star Dominique Wilkins?

Born in Paris, France, Jacques Dominique Wilkins is an American former professional basketball player.

His family moved to Dallas and Baltimore before ultimately settling in Washington, North Carolina.

His younger brother, Gerald Wilkins, also played in the NBA, primarily for the New York Knicks.

Wilkins played college basketball at the University of Georgia, where he was named SEC Men's Basketball Player of the Year in 1981.

However, he left college after his junior year, determined to go pro.

In 1982, he was the first round, third overall pick in the NBA draft, selected by the Utah Jazz.

However, several months later, Wilkins was traded to the Atlanta Hawks, where he would spend 12 years as a small forward.

He also played for the Los Angeles Clippers, Boston Celtics, San Antonio Spurs, and Orlando Magic.

Wilkins also found success abroad, competing for basketball clubs in Greece (Panathinaikos) and Italy (Fortitudo Bologna).

Nicknamed "the Human Highlight Reel," Wilkins amassed numerous awards and accolades during his 17-year professional career, including:

NBA 75th Anniversary Team (2021)

Nine-time NBA All-Star (1986 - 1994)

Seven-time All-NBA Team member (1986 - 1994)

Two-time NBA Slam Dunk Contest champion (1985, 1990)

EuroLeague champion (1996)

NBA scoring champion (1986)

Wilkins has served as the vice president of basketball operations for the Atlanta Hawks since 2004.

On October 30, it was announced that the NBA legend committed to a documentary project about his life and career.

Speaking with The Hollywood Reporter, Wilkins said: “I want the documentary to be about the man, as well as the basketball player."

Time will tell whether the documentary, slated to be released sometime ahead of the 2024 NBA season, will focus on Wilkins' past or current relationships.

However, movie-goers can expect an inspirational tale, as Wilkins said “I don’t want it to just be a tell-all story, but I want it to be a motivational story as well."

Who are Dominique Wilkins’s ex-wives?

Wilkins has been married – and divorced – three times.

He first tied the knot with then-girlfriend Nicole Berry in 1992.

The couple had four children, daughters Alysandra, Aiysha, Chloe, and Danielle.

They divorced in 2003 after 11 years of marriage.

Wilkins then married Robin Campbell Wilkins in 2006.

The couple had one son, Jacob, and one daughter, Jolie, before getting divorced.

He is also the stepfather of professional basketball player and coach Isaiah Wilkins, Robin's son from a previous relationship.

Not much is known about when Wilkins married his third wife, Sunny, but the couple ultimately divorced in 2018.

Who is Dominique Wilkins dating now?

The fourth time may be the charm for Wilkins, who is currently in a relationship with Jedidia Hazlewood.

While it's unknown when the duo linked up, they posted their first picture together on Instagram in August 2022, and have kept posting pictures regularly on each other's accounts.

Hazlewood, a Queens, New York, native and current Atlanta, Georgia, resident, is a former law enforcement personnel.

She previously worked at the Metropolitan Atlanta Rapid Transit Authority (MARTA) and as a Deputy at the Dale County Sheriff's Office.

Hazlewood is currently a sergeant at the City of Lithonia Police Department.

Hazlewood also has four daughters from a past relationship.
